headline: Unethical Admin
pros: Not really anything good to say.
cons:
Staff is constantly pushed to lie and scam customers.
Toxic work environment.

headline: Beware
pros: There are no advantages to working for this company
cons: Be careful and watch out for yourself.

headline: Management does not give AF!
pros: Easy office job where you can go online, watch movies, and handle personal matters without anyone bothering you.
cons: Management and staff does not give AF about customers. They treat PPP applications like trash and then we end up getting complaints.
